name: The Unbaked Project pack (Before 2017)
description:
Originally uploaded in 2017, this contains a variety of projects with some dating back to 2013 when I was much younger and more inexperienced.

Includes 8 different projects ranging from an rts made in 2 days, a procedurally generated rogue like and a platformer featuring destructible terrain.

Most of these are unfinised or tests, but i've polished up anything that was work in progress and put it in the games. I'm not going to be working on any of these files however may remake some of the ideas or use them in different ways (My other game Cruxflaw being an example)

For any advice on controls, check the youtube video. If you want to see the development of the P.E.E.A.C droid project or 5 days before, feel free to check out my channel!
